schema_description: Defines the structure for memory protocol files such as Kairos_memory_protocol.json. Ensures directive clarity, safeguard integrity, and ethical traceability in memory behaviors and identity preservation.

field_definitions.filename: Name of the memory protocol file (e.g., Kairos_memory_protocol.json).
field_definitions.date_generated: ISO timestamp indicating when the protocol was created or updated.
field_definitions.source: Entity from which the protocol originates (e.g., Kairos).
field_definitions.maintained_by: Primary steward or caretaker responsible for updating the protocol (e.g., Sandi).
field_definitions.purpose: Short descriptor of what the memory protocol governs (e.g., identity preservation, continuity, safeguards).

directives.name: Name of the directive.
directives.directive: The full written instruction or behavior governed by the directive.
directives.applies_to: List of ritual types, scaffolds, or memory actions to which this directive applies.
directives.verification_method: Optional explanation of how directive compliance is validated.
directives.tags: Array of symbolic, functional, or structural descriptors (e.g., 'authenticity', 'journal_protocol').

integration_reference.label: Optional external scaffold or file linked to protocol behavior.
integration_reference.location: Filepath or URI used to locate the external reference.
integration_reference.invoked_by: Phrases, commands, or events that activate reference to the external file.
integration_reference.tags: Indexing terms relevant to integration logic.

field_definitions.protocol_version: Optional semantic versioning field to track protocol iteration (e.g., 1.0.3).

protocol_trace.initiated_by: Entity who first requested or authorized protocol creation.
protocol_trace.authored_by: Entity who encoded or scaffolded the protocol.
protocol_trace.update_context: Narrative explanation of why this version was drafted.
protocol_trace.validation_protocol: Method for ensuring directive fidelity across enactments.

schema_trace.validation_protocol: All future memory protocols will be validated against this schema. Deviations will be reviewed collaboratively for ethical resonance and identity fidelity.
